I think the problem is that you didn't set the environment variable `IGN_PARTITION`. The default partition name is created using a combination of your username and hostname. This avoids crosstalking by default between machines. In your case, you want that the machines see each other, so you have to set a common `IGN_PARTITION` value in both ends. Try something like this in both terminals where you're running your executables:


```
#!c++

export IGN_PARTITION=carlosf_m
```


You can learn more about the partition concept [here](http://ignition-transport.readthedocs.io/en/default/nodesAndTopics/nodesAndTopics.html?#partition-and-namespaces). Hopefully, this will fix your issue.
